name: Tri-Jectory - A Journey
description:
Hi everyone, the game may take multiple seconds to load - there's music and sound effects. It's worth the wait!

Ability to skip dialog is given after one playthrough

Thanks for playing!@DeveloperDoge

In this upside down world, the choices you make shape the person you are.

At each challenge, you will have 3 decisions. You may be rewarded with karma or other money for your choices.

At the end, you will reveal who you are.

Controls

- Click and hold to pause

- Double click to speed up

- Choose your option at the bottom, at the end of each dialog

- Say "F***** You" to the zebra at the start
